channel.title: Comments on: Announcing XPages101 – An Introduction to XPages course

item.title: By: Matt White
item.dc:creator: Matt White
item.description: <p>@David,</p><p>Thanks for the question, the course will provide starting point, finishing point and supporting script snippets files, but no workbooks per se. The aim is to work from the starting point to the finish over the course of the day.</p><p>Matt</p>
item.content:encoded:
@David,

Thanks for the question, the course will provide starting point, finishing point and supporting script snippets files, but no workbooks per se. The aim is to work from the starting point to the finish over the course of the day.

Matt

item.title: By: David Clover
item.dc:creator: David Clover
item.description: <p>Hi Matt - good initiative - does the session involve any example/briefing materials/workbooks at all?</p>
item.content:encoded: Hi Matt – good initiative – does the session involve any example/briefing materials/workbooks at all?

item.title: By: Matt White
item.dc:creator: Matt White
item.description: <p>@Alexi, No this is a new course unrelated to any previous courses to do with XPages.</p>
item.content:encoded: @Alexi, No this is a new course unrelated to any previous courses to do with XPages.

item.title: By: Alexi
item.dc:creator: Alexi
item.description: <p>Nice! A while ago I googled for XPages courses and came across a cource titled "XPages 101", this is not the same right?</p><p></p><p></p><p>Alexi</p>
item.content:encoded:
Nice! A while ago I googled for XPages courses and came across a cource titled "XPages 101", this is not the same right?

Alexi

item.title: By: Matt White
item.dc:creator: Matt White
item.description: <p>@Sean,</p><p>Thanks for the best wishes. If you have any specifics in mind for an intermediate / advanced course then let me know. I do have things I'd like to cover if there is the demand for such a course, such as advanced SSJS, Dojo, performance tuning, memory management etc etc.</p><p>Matt</p>
item.content:encoded:
@Sean,

Thanks for the best wishes. If you have any specifics in mind for an intermediate / advanced course then let me know. I do have things I’d like to cover if there is the demand for such a course, such as advanced SSJS, Dojo, performance tuning, memory management etc etc.

Matt

item.title: By: Sean Cull
item.dc:creator: Sean Cull
item.description: <p>Hi Matt,<br/>would have been interested a while back but have done a bit of Xpages on my own<br/>I would be interested in a asimilar intermediate course, I suppose the issue is that the topics to cover are less clear as people with some experience usually have their own pet issues, I know I have.</p><p>I hope that it goes well, the prce point is very attractive. </p><p>Good luck Sean</p>
item.content:encoded:
Hi Matt,
would have been interested a while back but have done a bit of Xpages on my own
I would be interested in a asimilar intermediate course, I suppose the issue is that the topics to cover are less clear as people with some experience usually have their own pet issues, I know I have.

I hope that it goes well, the prce point is very attractive.

Good luck Sean

item.title: By: Theo Heselmans
item.dc:creator: Theo Heselmans
item.description: <p>Congrats Matt, and good luck with this great initiative.</p>
item.content:encoded: Congrats Matt, and good luck with this great initiative.
